context: Hey. Do you like Eddie Murphy?
He's OK. I like Bill Murray better
Cause I recommend Life (1999) for the grownups. And Dr. Dolittle (1998) for the family.
Oh, I haven't seen cause I recommend life and I saw Dr. Dolittle (1998) a million years ago I liked Stripes (1981)
There's another one I like something about a guy 'Bob'
resp: If you're in the mood for a revamp of Bill Murray I suggest Happy Death Day (2017) for Groundhog Day (1993).
